project.description:
This will build a new release structure from the current s3 location.
we are using a date for the release atm.
If you add a new partition you will currently need to add another line to the job to copy it.
We could probably just use the s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/hpds/genomics_javabins/9b/v4.1/releases/current/ location instead of the build.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: s3_destination_prefix
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
S3 destination prefix.
Update the date with the release date associated with the release being built. ( or close approx date ).

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash aws sts assume-role --duration-seconds 3600 --role-arn arn:aws:iam::736265540791:role/dbgap-etl --role-session-name "s3-test" > assume-role-output.txt export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=`grep AccessKeyId assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=`grep SecretAccessKey assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SESSION_TOKEN=`grep SessionToken assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"`
aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/hpds/genomics_javabins/9b/v4.1/releases/current/partition1/ ${s3_destination_prefix}/batch1/ --recursive --metadata-directive REPLACE aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/hpds/genomics_javabins/9b/v4.1/releases/current/partition2/ ${s3_destination_prefix}/batch2/ --recursive --metadata-directive REPLACE aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/hpds/genomics_javabins/9b/v4.1/releases/current/partition3/ ${s3_destination_prefix}/batch3/ --recursive --metadata-directive REPLACE aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/hpds/genomics_javabins/9b/v4.1/releases/current/partition4/ ${s3_destination_prefix}/batch4/ --recursive --metadata-directive REPLACE aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/hpds/genomics_javabins/9b/v4.1/releases/current/partition5/ ${s3_destination_prefix}/batch5/ --recursive --metadata-directive REPLACE aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/hpds/genomics_javabins/9b/v4.1/releases/current/partition6/ ${s3_destination_prefix}/batch6/ --recursive --metadata-directive REPLACE aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/hpds/genomics_javabins/9b/v4.1/releases/current/partition7/ ${s3_destination_prefix}/batch7/ --recursive --metadata-directive REPLACE aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/hpds/genomics_javabins/9b/v4.1/releases/current/partition8/ ${s3_destination_prefix}/batch8/ --recursive --metadata-directive REPLACE
